tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE reports (
	report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	campaign_name VARCHAR(255),
	start_date DATE,
	end_date DATE,
	clicks INT,
	conversions INT,
	revenue DECIMAL(10,2)
)

CREATE TABLE campaign_data (
  campaign_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  ad_spend DECIMAL(10, 2),
  conversions INT,
  revenue DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE campaign_reports (
  report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  campaign_id INT,
  report_date DATE,
  impressions INT,
  clicks INT,
  cost DECIMAL(10, 2),
  roi DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE campaign_metrics (
  campaign_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  impressions INT,
  clicks INT,
  conversions INT,
  cost DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE purchase_history (
  purchase_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  campaign_id INT,
  purchase_amount DECIMAL,
  purchase_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE roi_reports (
  report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  campaign_id INT,
  roi DECIMAL,
  report_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE campaign_metrics (
    campaign_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    clicks INT,
    impressions INT,
    conversions INT,
    cost DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE campaign_roi (
    campaign_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    revenue DECIMAL,
    cost DECIMAL,
    roi DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE campaign_dates (
    campaign_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE campaign_performance (
    campaign_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    clicks INT,
    impressions INT,
    conversions INT,
    revenue DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE campaign_summary (
    campaign_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    total_clicks INT,
    total_impressions INT,
    total_conversions INT,
    total_revenue DECIMAL
)
